// File: client/src/pages/Home.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import api from '../utils/api'; const Home = () => { const [featuredGigs, setFeaturedGigs] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { // Fetch featured gigs (top rated gigs) const gigsResponse = await api.get('/gigs?sort=top_rated&limit=8'); setFeaturedGigs(gigsResponse.data); // Fetch categories - normally would be a separate API call // For now, hardcoding categories based on requirements setCategories([ { id: 'technical', name: 'Technical Services', icon: 'üíª', color: 'bg-blue-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-blue-600' }, { id: 'design', name: 'Design & Creative', icon: 'üé®', color: 'bg-purple-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-purple-600' }, { id: 'writing', name: 'Writing & Translation', icon: '‚úçÔ∏è', color: 'bg-yellow-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-yellow-600' }, { id: 'electrical', name: 'Electrical Work', icon: '‚ö°', color: 'bg-orange-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-orange-600' }, { id: 'plumbing', name: 'Plumbing Services', icon: 'üöø', color: 'bg-blue-400', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-blue-500' }, { id: 'cleaning', name: 'Cleaning Services', icon: 'üßπ', color: 'bg-green-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-green-600' }, { id: 'grooming', name: 'Personal Grooming', icon: 'üíá', color: 'bg-pink-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-pink-600' }, { id: 'caregiving', name: 'Caregiving', icon: 'üëµ', color: 'bg-indigo-500', hoverColor: 'hover:bg-indigo-600' } ]); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching home data:', error); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; fetchData(); }, []); if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (

{/* App Screen Mockup */}
BookMyService
{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about using BookMyService

How do I get started as a freelancer?

Register an account, complete your profile with your skills and experience, and start creating gigs to showcase your services. You can also browse available jobs and submit proposals.

How does payment protection work?

Our escrow system holds client payments until the work is completed satisfactorily. This ensures freelancers get paid for completed work and clients receive the services they've paid for.

What service categories are available?

BookMyService offers a wide range of categories including technical services, design, writing, electrical work, plumbing, cleaning, personal grooming, caregiving, and more.

Is there a fee to use BookMyService?

It's free to join and create a profile. A service fee is applied to transactions once a job is completed. This fee helps maintain the platform and provide user support.
